title: Water K.Y.-5
marks:
Signature, Title, and Mark

 LRC, in pencil: [Ayomi]; bottom center, in pencil:
description: close-up, somewhat impressionistic depiction of ripples on water; rendered in deep maroon, browns, silver, and reds
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
